isNameUniqueInContext

public static boolean isNameUniqueInContext(DeployModelObject parent,
                                            java.lang.String name)
Determine if a given name is unique in the context of a given parent.

Parameters:
parent - the parent DeployModelObject
name - the name to check for uniqueness
Returns:
true if the name is unique; false otherwise; false if the name is invalid (null or 0 length)

generateUniqueName

public static java.lang.String generateUniqueName(DeployModelObject parent,
                                                  java.lang.String prefix)
Generates a unique name for a DeployModelObject. The 'name' field on a DeployModelObject must be unique among its siblings.

NOTE: Although this method is in UnitUtil it's safe to call for any DeployModelObject.

Parameters:
parent -
prefix -
Returns:
a String this is unique among the direct children of 'dmo' and can be safely used as the 'name' field.

getHostedUnits

public static java.util.List getHostedUnits(Unit unit)
Returns a list of all units hosted on a unit in the topology.

Does not invoke discovery. Use TopologyDiscoverService.

Parameters:
unit - a unit whose hosting links will be examined.
Returns:
List

overridable

public static java.lang.String overridable(java.util.Map m,
                                           java.lang.String name,
                                           java.lang.String val,
                                           java.lang.String def)
Return a value with optional override and optional special value on null.

Parameters:
m - Map of String->String, used for overrides
name - name of String in map that overrides val
val - the value to use if there is no override
def - the value to use if val is null
Returns:
Either m[name], val, or def
